PyDevMgr - Python Development Manager

Github Repository: link

Description:

The PyDevMgr provides a simple GUI interface to launch development tools/environments.

Features

  • Create new task
  • Execute task
  • Update task
  • Track number of times executed
  • Remove task
  • Sorts tasks by number of times executed in descending order
